choose.when: SELECT PI.PRO_INQ_ID AS inquiryId, PI.BYR_ID AS buyerId, PI.INQ_TYPE AS inquiryType, PI.CONTENT AS content, PI.STATUS AS status, PI.CRE_DATE AS createdDate, PI.PDT_ID AS productId, PI.IS_SECRET AS isSecret, PR.PRO_RES_ID AS responseId, PR.CONTENT AS responseContent, PR.CRE_DATE AS responseDate, PII.IMAGE_PATH AS imagePath FROM PRO_INQUIRIES PI LEFT JOIN PRO_RESPONSES PR ON PI.PRO_INQ_ID = PR.PRO_INQ_ID LEFT JOIN PRO_INQUIRY_IMAGES PII ON PI.PRO_INQ_ID = PII.PRO_INQ_ID WHERE PI.PRO_INQ_ID = #{inquiryId}
choose.otherwise: SELECT GI.GEN_INQ_ID AS inquiryId, GI.BYR_ID AS buyerId, GI.INQ_TYPE AS inquiryType, GI.CONTENT AS content, GI.STATUS AS status, GI.CRE_DATE AS createdDate, NULL AS productId, NULL AS isSecret, GR.GEN_RES_ID AS responseId, GR.CONTENT AS responseContent, GR.CRE_DATE AS responseDate, GII.IMAGE_PATH AS imagePath FROM GEN_INQUIRIES GI LEFT JOIN GEN_RESPONSES GR ON GI.GEN_INQ_ID = GR.GEN_INQ_ID LEFT JOIN GEN_INQUIRY_IMAGES GII ON GI.GEN_INQ_ID = GII.GEN_INQ_ID WHERE GI.GEN_INQ_ID = #{inquiryId}

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRO_INQUIRIES ( PRO_INQ_ID, BYR_ID, INQ_TYPE, CONTENT, STATUS, CRE_DATE, PDT_ID, IS_SECRET ) VALUES ( SEQ_PRO_INQUIRIES.NEXTVAL, #{buyerId}, #{inquiryType}, #{content}, 'U', SYSDATE, #{productId}, #{isSecret} )
INSERT INTO GEN_INQUIRIES ( GEN_INQ_ID, BYR_ID, INQ_TYPE, CONTENT, STATUS, CRE_DATE ) VALUES ( SEQ_GEN_INQUIRIES.NEXTVAL, #{buyerId}, #{inquiryType}, #{content}, 'U', SYSDATE )
INSERT INTO PRO_INQUIRY_IMAGES ( PRO_INQ_IMG_ID, PRO_INQ_ID, IMAGE_PATH, CRE_DATE ) VALUES ( SEQ_PRO_INQUIRY_IMAGES.NEXTVAL, #{inquiryId}, #{imagePath}, SYSDATE )
INSERT INTO GEN_INQUIRY_IMAGES ( GEN_INQ_IMG_ID, GEN_INQ_ID, IMAGE_PATH, CRE_DATE ) VALUES ( SEQ_GEN_INQUIRY_IMAGES.NEXTVAL, #{inquiryId}, #{imagePath}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT PI.PRO_INQ_ID AS inquiryId, PI.BYR_ID AS buyerId, CAST(PI.INQ_TYPE AS INTEGER) AS inquiryType, PI.CONTENT AS content, PI.STATUS AS status, PI.CRE_DATE AS createdDate, PI.PDT_ID AS productId, PI.IS_SECRET AS isSecret, PR.PRO_RES_ID AS responseId, PR.CONTENT AS responseContent, PR.CRE_DATE AS responseDate, PII.IMAGE_PATH AS imagePath FROM PRO_INQUIRIES PI LEFT JOIN PRO_RESPONSES PR ON PI.PRO_INQ_ID = PR.PRO_INQ_ID LEFT JOIN PRO_INQUIRY_IMAGES PII ON PI.PRO_INQ_ID = PII.PRO_INQ_ID ORDER BY createdDate DESC
